ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: With a skill of 79, I only failed one silver item on Tuesday, and that was a silver blodstone earring. Yesterday, with a skill of 81, I failed 3 silver amber
ygData.messageBody:
With a skill of 79, I only failed one silver item on Tuesday, and that was a
silver blodstone earring.

Yesterday, with a skill of 81, I failed 3 silver amber rings... go figger...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Scott Fogle [SMTP:s.fog@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 8:59 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelery Roller coaster
>
> From: "Scott Fogle" <s.fog@...>
>
> Yes with a skill of 35 and an int. of 130 and wis. of 100 i was failing
> at
> items that became trivial a long time ago, which i had no problems making
> before the patch....
>
> Selwen
> The Rathe
